item.title: Help with my Error
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

That code is OK. you have oviously deleted or added a bracket. Thats why regular back-up saves are nessecery
Have you deleted the emotes and tryed to compile?
